T04sanss07u:3: tatra sukṛtârambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvatêti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā //
T04sanss07u:11: alpâdhamabhogenâpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā bahūttamabhoganāśanôpekṣā na kāryêti //
T04sanss07u:15: adhikasatvârthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyâdhikatulyakuśalântarāyakarau tyāgâtyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatîti //
T04sanss07u:17: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrâbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
T04sanss07u:22: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād /
T04sanss07u:23: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatvâikāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ-
T04sanss07u:25: gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T04sanss07u:28: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrâgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ /
T04sanss07u:30: sacet punaḥ kaścid evâgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta /
T04sanss07u:33: sacet punas tasyônaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmaca-
T04sanss07u:39: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenâlpêcchatâsevitā bhavet /
T04sanss07u:40: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrâbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tena dharmâsevitavyaḥ /
T04sanss07u:42: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahârthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvâśayaparikarmântarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād /
T04sanss07u:47: yo 'yaṃ vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādyêti kuto gamyate /
T04sanss07u:64: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nâtmanaḥ /
T04sanss07u:67: kiṃ tu satvârthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nâropayati /
T04sanss07u:68: yatra tu satvârthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti
T04sanss07u:71: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati /
T04sanss07u:74: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nâstîty upekṣate /
T04sanss07u:79: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathâryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā /
T04sanss07u:86: yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti /
T04sanss07u:90: yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti /
T04sanss07u:93: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nâtmanêti //
T04sanss07u:100: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahârthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate /
T04sanss07u:101: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt //
T04sanss07u:103: yâiṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyâikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ
T04sanss07u:104: yaś côddeśasvâdhyāyâbhiyukto bodhisatvaḥ sagauravo dharmaka-maḥ śraddhādeyam āhāraṃ parigṛhyâivaṃ cittam utpādayet /
T04sanss07u:106: asya kuśalasyâiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaitîti //
T04sanss07u:119: na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ /
T04sanss07u:126: sâivaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate /
T04sanss07u:129: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate /
T04sanss07u:130: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanâbhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate /
T04sanss07u:135: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaskṛto bhavati devaiḥ /
T04sanss07u:138: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadâpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgêndrâsurêndraiḥ /
T04sanss07u:139: sadā sumānitaś ca bhavati brāhmaṇakṣatriya śreṣṭhigṛhapatibhiḥ /
T04sanss07u:142: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyânukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ //
T04sanss07u:146: yad utâkṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt /
T04sanss07u:150: evaṃ pūrvôtsṛṣṭasyâpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar*upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā /
T04sanss07u:151: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra parârthāt /
T04sanss07u:155: dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti //
T04sanss07u:158: vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyâpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
T04sanss07u:163: pāpasya daurmanasyenâiva puṇyasya saumanasyenâpattiḥ satvârthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ //
T04sanss07u:165: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā /
T04sanss07u:166: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet //
T04sanss07u:171: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ /
T04sanss07u:178: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣavâitaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvâṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam /
T04sanss07u:180: anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntâdharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ /
T04sanss07u:181: atrântare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty- anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni /
T04sanss07u:182: yāvad athâyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenâñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
T04sanss07u:183: yad uktaṃ bhagavatâsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni /
T04sanss07u:184: kutrêmāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
T04sanss07u:189: atrôpāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
T04sanss07u:190: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanss07u:193: pratighaḥ pratighêti kalpaśatôpacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenôcyate pratighêti //
T04sanss07u:194: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvâvadānaṃ kathayantyâbhihitaṃ /
T04sanss07u:196: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smêti /
T04sanss07u:197: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryêti pradarśanârthaṃ sadêty u-
T04sanss07u:202: iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
T04sanss07u:207: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhâvaṣṭabdêva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ ku-
T04sanss07u:210: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
T04sanss07u:214: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti /
T04sanss07u:219: yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nônnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ /
T04sanss07u:221: na cireṇa kālena yasya câyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati
T04sanss07u:222: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv anāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā /
T04sanss07u:223: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sûpasthitasmṛtir viharatîti //
T04sanss07u:225: caṇḍālakumārôpamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā /
T04sanss07u:226: mānamadadarpâdhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti //
T04sanss07u:228: iha kulaputrâbhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisatvo mṛtakasadṛśo 'haṃ mitrâmātya-
T04sanss07u:231: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛttêti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanss07u:232: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanss07u:233: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmîti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanss07u:235: parapratibaddhā ca me jīvikêti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanss07u:243: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmîti nihatamāno bhavatîti //
T04sanss07u:249: sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyêti //
T04sanss07u:251: syād yathâpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate /
T04sanss07u:252: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti /
T04sanss07u:253: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyâlpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śro-
T04sanss07u:257: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānônnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati na praṇamati veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārâṅkuśâviddho vatâyaṃ bodhisatvêti //
T04sanss07u:262: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmâdhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrântarājapratilabdhānāṃ nâvanamati /
T04sanss07u:266: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na
T04sanss07u:268: prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatîti mārakarma //
T04sanss07u:274: adhimānaṃ côtpādyâjānann abudhyamāno varṇârhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati /
T04sanss07u:278: ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
T04sanss07u:286: vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati /
T04sanss07u:301: kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati /
T04sanss07u:312: sâivaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet /
T04sanss07u:313: atha ca punar bodhicittabalâdhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanss07u:318: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante /
T04sanss07u:331: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhâgamo bhavati /
T04sanss07u:334: sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate /
T04sanss07u:338: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittôtpādiko bodhisatvaḥ āditâiva sarvasatvānām antike daśaprakāraṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss07u:343: priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ /
T04sanss07u:347: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvâbhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmîty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate //
T04sanss07u:353: lokaprasādânurakṣârthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatâpi cetasā strīṣu vâkṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravâbhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ //
T04sanss07u:355: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhâsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt /
T04sanss07u:358: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍala nirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanenâttamanaskataro
T04sanss07u:362: teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītir adhyavasānam utpatet taddarśanâvitṛptatayā /
T04sanss07u:363: evam eva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatra maṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /
T04sanss07u:366: to yāvat teṣu sarvayācanakeṣu ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā
T04sanss07u:369: evam anyagatabhāve satvānām agratogamanôpasthānâdiprasaṅge sarvôtsargaṃ smaret /
T04sanss07u:373: athavā svāmy-aprasādabhītenêva tatprasādârthinêva tadājñāsaṃpādanā manasi kartavyā /
T04sanss07u:378: mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu /
T04sanss07u:380: āhara bhikṣu cīvarāṇi yāvat te dhopāmi /
T04sanss07u:381: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanss07u:382: mā bhagavān etasya glānasyâśucimraks.itāni cīvarāṇi dhovatu /
T04sanss07u:385: tena hy ānanda tvam etasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova /
T04sanss07u:389: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhovati /
T04sanss07u:392: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandas taṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cânuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet /
T04sanss07u:395: yān ārādhya mahat tvaṃ virādhya kaṣṭāṃ vipattim āpnoti /
T04sanss07u:396: prāṇaparityāgair api teṣāṃ nanu toṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ //
T04sanss07u:397: ete te vai satvāḥ prasādya yān siddham āgatā bahavaḥ /
T04sanss07u:399: ete cintāmaṇayo bhadraghaṭā dhenavaś ca kāmadughāḥ /
T04sanss07u:400: guruvac ca devatêva ca tasmād ārādhanīyās te //
T04sanss07u:402: satvârādhanam utsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet //
T04sanss07u:403: śirasā dhārayām āsa purā nātho yathêpsitam /
T04sanss07u:405: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśanty avīcīm yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt //
T04sanss07u:406: mahâpakāriṣv api tena sarvaṃ kalyāṇam e-
T04sanss07u:409: svayaṃ mama svāminâiva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ /
T04sanss07u:410: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
T04sanss07u:412: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munîndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
T04sanss07u:416: satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām //
T04sanss07u:419: tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām //
T04sanss07u:420: ārādhanāyâdya tathāgatānāṃ sarvâtmanā dāsyam upaimi loke /
T04sanss07u:421: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janâughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ //
T04sanss07u:422: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpâtmabhir nâiva hi saṃśayo 'tra /
T04sanss07u:425: tathāgatârādhanam etad eva svârthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva /
T04sanss07u:426: lokasya duṣkhâpaham etad eva tasmān mamâstu vratam etad eva //
T04sanss07u:429: yasmān nâiva sâikākī tasya rājabalaṃ balaṃ /
T04sanss07u:430: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcid aparāddhaṃ vimānayet //
T04sanss07u:431: yasmān narakapālāś ca kṛpāvantaś ca tadbalaṃ /
T04sanss07u:432: tasmād ārādhayet satvān bhṛtyaś caṇḍanṛpaṃ yathā //
T04sanss07u:433: kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād yena syān narakavyathā /
T04sanss07u:436: tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ nṛpatir dadyād yad buddhatvasamaṃ bhavet /
T04sanss07u:439: ihâiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi //
T04sanss07u:442: maitrâśayaś ca yat pūjyaḥ satvamāhātmyam eva tat /
T04sanss07u:443: buddhaprasādād yat puṇyaṃ buddhamāhātmyam eva tat //
T04sanss07u:456: iha bodhisatvâikākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito nâivaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanss07u:460: ye tv anye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sarve te saṃkīrṇavihāriṇaḥ /
T04sanss07u:465: iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati /
T04sanss07u:469: ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmâbhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet //
T04sanss07u:471: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā //
T04sanss07u:473: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyântarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt /
T04sanss07u:474: tad yathâpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyôdakabindor nântarâsti kṣayo yāvan na kalpaparyavasāna /
